entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 07:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
